Title: Halter Neck Evening Dress with Keyhole

----

Sizes: 6, 10, 8, 4, 12

Colors: aqua, fuchsia

Category: formal-gowns

Featured-image: 

----

Description: Backless halter top is pleated in the front and creates a Grecian style silhouette. The neckline and waist are embellished with circular bead work patterns. Brightly colored and elegant. There is a small peek-a-boo moment in the front of the bodice and the pleated chiffon skirt falls elegantly to the floor.
